name: Bunkrupt
description:
Try yourself as a CEO in a company that is close to bankruptcy. Remember that every second is important to you. Good luck in building a new structure of money turnover!

The game is very easy to manage, you will not need any effort to deal with it, but the game may not be easy to understand (at first). Interesting mechanics are waiting for you and you can come up with your own algorithm for making money and projects in the game.
